q: What is Puppeteer?
o: A Node.js library which provides a high-level API to control Chrome or Chromium over the DevTools Protocol
A Python library for web scraping

q: Which team maintains Puppeteer?
o: The Chrome DevTools team at Google

q: Does Puppeteer run headless by default?
o: Yes, it runs in headless mode unless configured otherwise

What browser does 'puppeteer' package download by default?
o: A recent version of Chromium that is guaranteed to work with the API

q: What is 'puppeteer-core'?
o: A lightweight version of Puppeteer that doesn't download Chromium by default

q: What is 'page.$eval()'?
o: Runs document.querySelector and passes the result to a page function

q: What is 'page.$$eval()'?
o: Runs document.querySelectorAll and passes the array to a page function

What is 'networkidle0'?
o: Consider navigation finished when there are no more than 0 network connections for at least 500ms

q: What is 'networkidle2'?
o: Consider navigation finished when there are no more than 2 network connections for at least 500ms

How to get bounding box of ElementHandle?
o: await element.boundingBox() // returns {x, y, width, height}

q: What if boundingBox returns null?
o: Element is not visible (display:none or detached)

q: How to scroll element into view?
o: element.evaluate(el => el.scrollIntoView()) or element.hover() implies it

How to click with modifier keys (Shift+Click)?
o: await page.keyboard.down('Shift'); await page.click('sel'); await page.keyboard.up('Shift');

q: How to count elements matching selector?
o: const count = await page.$$eval('sel', els => els.length);

q: How to get all link URLs on page?
o: const urls = await page.$$eval('a', as => as.map(a => a.href));

q: How to test 'target=_blank' links (new tab)?
o: Click link, then wait for browser.on('targetcreated') or pages count to increase

q: How to get the newly opened page?
o: const newTarget = await browser.waitForTarget(t => t.opener() === page.target()); const newPage = await newTarget.page();

o: Use 'request' event logic to verify url pattern
